channel.title: [508] Linux Error
channel.description:
My RSPS was originally on windows (XP), I transfered the files to my linux (Ubuntu) and I followed all steps in this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=367407.0 But when I type this into Terminal: [code]sh ./run.sh[/code]
I get an error like so: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: main/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: main.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: main/Server. Program will exit.[/code]
Inside my run.sh I have [code]#!/bin/bash
java main/Server 43594[/code]
Is there anyway I can make it run properly?
Thanks, Mike

item.title: [508] Linux Error
item.dc:creator: @Jr_Scape Jr. Scape
item.description:
@Jr_Scape wrote:

My RSPS was originally on windows (XP), I transfered the files to my linux (Ubuntu) and I followed all steps in this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=367407.0
But when I type this into Terminal:

sh ./run.sh

I get an error like so:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: main/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: main.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: main/Server. Program will exit.

Inside my run.sh I have

[code]#!/bin/bash

java main/Server 43594[/code]

Is there anyway I can make it run properly?

Thanks,
Mike
